text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
——And now the front of the pack enters the final 
straight, they line up side-by-side. Will the Uma 
Musume in the rear be able to break through!?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……Foolish. 
Do you really believe this is enough to block my path?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————Know your place!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Orfevre pushes forward! She breaks through! 
Moves to the front! She's lined up! And she passesーー!!

My heart was pounding. I clenched my fist. I didn't 
want to blink. My breathing stopped and I could only 
stare. It was so overwhelming and dazzling——
————The "King's" run.

After the race, I ran up to her, filled with excitement. 
However——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
————Insufficient. 
……like this is truly insufficient.

She wasn't satisfied by that victory at all, rather it almost 
seemed like she was seething. It stopped me in my tracks.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
——Orfevre! That was a truly wonderful run……! 
If it's you, you'll definitely be able to stand at 
the top……! Together with me, how about aiming for that?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Your talent is overwhelming! Better than any famous Uma Musume 
from the past……! Together let's build a brilliant new legend!

Several trainers with far more experience 
than me ran up and surrounded her……!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: …………fools, what are you misunderstanding?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
You will not be the one selecting. Trainer, or Uma Musume, it matters not. 
————It is always I, the "King", who will be selecting.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
There is no one here, suitable for the "King". 
……it seems it was Selection in name only.

……『It is always I, the "King", who will be selecting』 
Those words kept me rooted in place.

On this day, all I could do was stare at Orfevre's back, 
along with all the other rejected trainers, as she left.

……Several days later. I was still thinking back about 
Orfevre, wondering what I should have done at the time——
——Excuse me, the trainer over there.

When I turned around, there was an Uma Musume that 
I didn't recognize. She bowed respectfully.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for being so sudden. 
I am one of Orfevre-sama's vassals.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
The "King" is summoning you. 
Would you come with me?

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text: ————I have brought them.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Well done.

In the place I was brought to there was not only 
Orfevre, but several other Uma Musume attending 
her. They were probably also her vassals……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————On that day, what did you see?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It was only you. At the previous Selection Race, you were the 
only one who stood before me with a different expression.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Answer me plainly. What did you see in my run?

Her piercing gaze made me feel slightly intimidated. 
A half-hearted answer would be unacceptable. I desperately 
tried to put in to words what I saw in her that day——

——On that day, there had been a quiet fury in Orfevre. 
And to me……that expression made me feel a sense of deja vu.

And that feeling was probably because of…… 
The day I first met Orfevre. It was the same grim 
expression she showed in front of that exhibit.

She said it on that day. That she would step past 
those Triple Crown Uma Musume. Along with that 
self-confidence there was……a competitive spirit.

During the Selection Race, there was a reason Orfevre was 
irritated even after winning. I now had a hypothesis.

She was the only one in the Selection Race 
that was looking at something else. She was 
already looking to the Triple Crown. Which means——
choice_data_list: That your run won't win the Triple Crown

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text: You……! What are you saying to the "King"——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Stop. 
………then, what did you find lacking in that run?

『What can be improved?』 is that what she's asking? Under that 
pressure of hers, I think about that Selection Race once again.

I listed as many other improvements I could think of, 
like the start and positioning. And while saying that——

Something new came to mind. 
………A strong desire. A dream.

The form of a true "King". 
I wanted to see it. A run that overturned heaven and earth.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————Then, create it.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
The points of improvement you mentioned…… 
A plan to improve my run, offer one up forthwith.

Was this a chance to form a contract? 
I felt like my heart was overflowing——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——This is the King's order. 
Understand that meaning, and do your utmost.

The one doing the selecting was the "King", Orfevre. That fact 
weighed heavily on my heart, even as it was about to float away.
